articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of Party and State
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Assumption of Top Posts of Party and State
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the People's Palace of Culture Monday to mark the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials of institutions and industrial establishments, labor innovators and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and director of the KPA General Political Bureau, made a report.
					
					 Holding Kim Jong Un in high esteem as first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was a special event as it opened a new history of great prosperity on the road of the party, the country and the nation and a grand revolutionary event, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Having Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party and the state helped give steady continuity to the lifeline of the Juche revolution, Songun revolution and eternally preserve the revolutionary character of the party and state as the great ones of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and provided a guarantee for sure victory of the general advance in the new century of Juche.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is an iron-willed commander who has consolidated the self-reliant defence capability in every way with his invincible Songun revolutionary leadership and reliably protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation.
					
					 After setting it as the general duty for army-building to model the entire army on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he advanced original ideas and theories for army-building such as the four-point line of strengthening the army and remarkably developed the KPA into a powerful treasured sword for safeguarding the country, the revolution and the people.
					
					 Under his guidance the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have grown to be revolutionary army of the party firmly based on the party's monolithic command system, an ideologically and morally strong army fully equipped with the revolutionary faith of Mt. Paektu and the spirit of the red flag and an elite matchless army having ultra-modern striking means.
					
					 He initiated the movement for becoming crack shots and personally organized and commanded various operations and combat trainings to make sure that the entire army intensified the military training the way the anti-Japanese guerrillas did in Mt. Paektu so that all service personnel are trained as stalwart fighters capable of waging modern warfare, possessed of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's strategy and tactics, heroic fighting spirit and perfect capability to fight an actual war.
					
					 He laid down the new line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and energetically led the work for steadily making the defence industry more Juche-oriented, modern and scientific and developing and producing more diverse and powerful weapons and equipment of Korean-style, thereby further consolidating the material and technical foundation of self-reliant defence capability.
					
					 The DPRK emerged the strongest nuclear power possessed of even H-bomb. This is one of the greatest feats he performed for the country and nation and for the victory of the Juche revolution and the people's cause of independence.
					
					 He is the great statesman and great master of leadership as he provided a new springboard for building a great thriving nation by ushering in a new great era of creation and changes with his distinguished political caliber and tested and seasoned leadership.
					
					 The reporter called on all party members and service personnel and people to firmly protect Kim Jong Un politically and ideologically and with their lives and single-mindedly remain loyal to him with the national pride of having the peerlessly great man at the top posts of the party, state and army.
					
					 All service personnel and people will never tolerate the reckless provocations of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to block the advance of the DPRK and stifle its ideology, cause and socialist system but resolutely foil them by dint of justice and wage a positive struggle for the independent reunification of the country, global peace and security and the cause of human independence, the reporter stressed.
					
					 He called on all the service personnel and people to wage an all-out charge to glorify the Seventh Congress of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and unprecedented labor achievements and bring earlier the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and future of a reunified thriving nation, united close behind Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Bashar AlÔºçAssad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on April 10.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend my sincere warm congratulations to you on April 15 this year, the 104th birth anniversary of the great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK. And I wish you good health and happiness and the friendly people of your country bigger progress and prosperity,
					
					 We come to recollect the great exploits of HE President Kim Il Sung who founded the DPRK, set forth the main line of the Korean revolution and thus led your friendly country to defend its sovereignty and independence, pursue an independent policy and hold an important position in the world arena on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					 On this special opportunity, I am convinced that the good relations between the Syrian Arab Republic and the DPRK would grow stronger in the interests of the peoples of our two friendly countries.

articles.title: 50th Anniversary of DPRK-Palestine Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
50th Anniversary of DPRK-Palestine Diplomatic Ties Marked
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A solidarity meeting took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Tuesday to mark the 50th anniversary of the establishment of the diplomatic ties between the DPRK and the State of Palestine.
					 Invited to the meeting were Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials.
					
					 Attending the meeting were Sin Hong Chol, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and vice-chairman of the DPRK-Palestine Friendship and Solidarity Committee, officials concerned and citizens.
					
					 Sin Hong Chol said President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il always paid deep attention to the just cause of the Palestinian people to regain the legitimate national rights including the establishment of the independent state.
					
					 The Korean people will invariably support the struggle of the Palestinian people in the future, too, Sin said, renewing the will to make every effort to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 The Palestinian ambassador said President Kim Il Sung and President Yasser Arafat laid the foundation of the relations of friendship between Palestine and the DPRK and developed them in common desire and purposes.
					
					 He hoped that the Korean people will overcome all difficulties and achieve big successes in the drive for building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Message of Congratulations Kim Jong Un Sent to Teaching Staff and Students of Korea University Conveyed
articles.content:
Message of Congratulations Kim Jong Un Sent to Teaching Staff and Students of Korea University Conveyed
Tokyo, April 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting for conveying a message of congratulations supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent to the teaching staff and students of Korea University on its diamond jubilee was held at the university in Tokyo on April 10.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and Vice-Chairman Pae Ik Ju of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Vice-Chairwoman Kang Chu Ryon who is chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Song Kun Hak, director of the Education Department, Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, Ku Tae Sok, president of the Union of Korean Educational Association in Japan, Jang Pyong Thae, rector of Korea University, Pak Yong Sik, chairman of the board of directors of Korea University, teaching staff and students of the university.  
					
					 Ho Jong Man read out a message of congratulations Kim Jong Un sent to the teaching staff and students of Korea University on its diamond jubilee.
					
					 Jang Pyong Thae read out a letter to Kim Jong Un at the meeting.

articles.title: Matriculation Ceremony of Korea University Held
articles.content:
Matriculation Ceremony of Korea University Held
Tokyo, April 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- A matriculation ceremony of Korea University for Juche 105 (2016) took place at the university hall in Tokyo on April 10.
					 Present at the ceremony were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Vice-Chairman Pae Ik Ju, Vice-Chairwoman Kang Chu Ryon who is chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, Jang Pyong Thae, rector of the university, Pak Yong Sik, chairman of the board of directors of the university, senior officials of organizations and enterprises, other officials of Chongryon, new students of the university and their parents, teaching staff and students of the university and other Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Congratulatory messages from the Education Commission of the DPRK and organs of Chongryon were read out at the ceremony.
					
					 Chairman Ho Jong Man in his congratulatory speech said Korea University is a dignified university of overseas Koreans associated with warm loving care of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and the highest seat of national education with a history of fervent patriotism, loyalty and struggle of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 It is the greatest honor of the university, warm love for all Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan and a historic event guaranteeing the eternity of the movement of Koreans in Japan that Kim Jong Un sent a message to congratulate the teaching staff and students of the university on its 60th birthday, he added.
					
					 He called on the students, who entered the university this year marking its 60th birthday, to translate their beautiful dreams and ideals into realities with great ambitions.
					
					 Jang Pyong Thae made a report to be followed by oath-taking speeches.

articles.title: Spokesman of DPRK Foreign Ministry Refutes Absurd Story about Dialogue
articles.content:
Spokesman of DPRK Foreign Ministry Refutes Absurd Story about Dialogue
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Tuesday over the absurd story about dialogue being floated around the DPRK.
					A touch-and-go situation is now prevailing on the Korean peninsula due to the moves of the U.S. for a nuclear war. Nevertheless, some countries are talking about the six-party talks, simultaneous pushing forward of denuclearization and the conclusion of a peace treaty and the like.
					
					Even a mere child knows well that dialogue is impossible under the present tense situation on the peninsula.
					
					There is only the danger of nuclear clash on the Korean peninsula due to the unprecedented U.S.-south Korea joint military drills for aggression and the entirely just measures taken by the Korean People's Army to cope with them.
					
					Dialogue should be based on mutual respect and equality among its parties.
					
					The DPRK doesn't oppose dialogue but categorically rejects any unequal dialogue.
					
					It is the DPRK's consistent and principled stand not to have a dialogue under unilateral pressure.
					
					Dialogue and military threat, dialogue and sanctions can never go together.
					
					Such logic that the purpose of imposing sanctions is to have a dialogue can never work on the DPRK.
					
					Due to the ever-escalating hostile acts of the U.S., the nuclear issue of the DPRK has long been away from its negotiating table.
					
					The DPRK's proposal that it would put a moratorium on its nuclear test in return for the U.S. halt to the joint war drills would no longer be valid as the latter turned it down.
					
					As already clarified by the DPRK, it will steadily and dynamically push ahead with its line of simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts until the world is denuclearized.
					
					The urgent issue to be settled on the Korean peninsula is to put a definite end to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the root cause of all problems.
					
					Whether the issue would be solved through dialogue and negotiations or through other methods entirely depends on the attitude of the U.S.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society Demands S. Korean Authorities Send back DPRK Abductees
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society Demands S. Korean Authorities Send back DPRK Abductees
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK released a statement Tuesday in connection with the fact that the south Korean authorities lured and abducted a group of DPRK employees in broad daylight.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities, on April 7, reporting about the "group defection" of DPRK's employees of a restaurant in Ningbo, Zhejiang Province of China, claimed "they accepted the employees from a humanitarian stand by respecting their will".
					
					 They are also building up public opinion to give impression that the case of "group defection" is a "substantial effect" of the implementation of "UN resolution on sanctions against the north" and a reflection of the "skepticism and aspiration of the northerners for south Korean society".
					
					 Refuting it as an unprecedented group abduction committed by the gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service, the statement clarified the following stand:
					
					1. We sternly denounce the group abduction of the citizens of the DPRK as a hideous crime against its dignity and social system and the life and security of its citizens.
					
					 The recent case of "group defection" cooked up by the puppet group is a crucial provocation against the DPRK which can never be tolerated as it is an unbearable insult to the people of the DPRK.
					
					 2. The puppet group should apologize for the hideous group abduction and immediately send all of the abductees back to the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet group has to ferret out criminals and the back-stage manipulators who took the citizens of the DPRK to south Korea by employing all sorts of appeasement, deception and gimmicks and bring the criminals to justice in the DPRK.
					
					 We have detailed information of how the gangsters of the puppet Intelligence Service lured and appeased the citizens of the DPRK to south Korea and which country connived it and which country in Southeast Asia they were taken through as well as the method used for the purpose.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should not keep the citizens of the DPRK away from contact with outside under the pretext of "protection of safety" and appease and pressurize them in the back room but unconditionally accept our demand and send back those innocent nationals of the DPRK without delay.
					
					2. In case the puppet group does not send them back, it will have to pay a high price for the serious consequences to be entailed by its action.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should bear in mind that unless they apologize for the hideous abduction and send those abductees back, they will face unimaginable serious consequences and severe punishment.

articles.title: Live-shell Firing Drill Staged by KPA Units
articles.content:
Live-shell Firing Drill Staged by KPA Units
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Artillery sub-units under large combined units of the Korean People's Army staged a live-shell firing drill under the simulated conditions of beating back the enemy forces conducting a surprise night landing on April 9.
					 Involved in the drill were artillery pieces of different calibers of KPA large combined units 526 and 287.
					
					 KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army General Ri Myong Su, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, supervised the drill.
					
					 The drill was observed by teachers of Kim Il Sung Military University and Kim Jong Il Military Postgraduate Institute.
					
					 The drill was staged by the way of destroying targets of incoming "enemy" support warships and wiping out "enemy" landing groups at pitch-dark night through intensive fire.
					
					 Batteries promptly took their positions with high mobility.
					
					 Mock "enemy" warships suddenly intruding into territorial waters of the DPRK in pitch darkness were spotted and identified accurately and the batteries were promptly ready to open fire. 
					
					 When a firing order was issued, the batteries hit the "enemy" warships one after another with deafening roars.
					
					 The intruding "enemy" warships were all blown up at once and the theater of the operation turned into a sea of flames.
					
					 Intensive firings were conducted by artillery pieces of various calibers to eliminate the landing "enemy" groups.
					
					 The live-shell firing drill demonstrated the invincibility of the strong revolutionary armed forces of Marshal Kim Jong Un to counter any provocation of the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean puppet group of traitors with a prompt counter-action and react to their war of aggression with a great just war for national reunification.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Kunja Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected at Kunja Revolutionary Site
Songchon, April 12 (KCNA) -- Statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected at the Kunja Revolutionary Site.
					 The President left his first footprint at Phyongchon-ri after the liberation of the country, unrolling the grand plan for founding independent national defence industry. In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War he put forward the policy for moving an ordnance factory to the underground tunnel in Kunja-ri, wisely leading the struggle to produce weapons in wartime.
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited Kunja-ri on May 24, Juche 56 (1967) and looked round underground workshops associated with the warm care shown by the President in the days of the war. He gave an instruction to build a revolutionary museum there and turn it into a center for educating the younger generation. 
					
					 The Kunja Revolutionary Museum and the Kunja Revolutionary Site were built on the occasion of the 30th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The statues were unveiled with due ceremony on Tuesday.
					
					 Present at the unveiling ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Ri Man Gon, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), Pak Thae Song, chief secretary of the South Phyongan Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of the C.C., the WPK, officials, workers and technicians in the munitions industry field, officials of units who contributed to erecting the statues, persons of distinguished services and builders.
					
					 Leading officials of the party and state and officials of the munitions industry field unveiled the statues.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of supreme leader Kim Jong Un was placed before the statues.
					
					 Laid there were a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet and a floral basket in the name of workers, technicians and officials in the field of munitions industry across the country.
					
					 Also placed before the statues were floral baskets in the names of different units including the munitions industry field.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a speech.
					
					 It is the eruption of the firm faith and ardent loyalty of all the service personnel and people to add eternal shine to the revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu who devoted their all to the development of the Juche-oriented national defense industry and thoroughly carry out the party's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts in the fighting spirit of the heroic workers of the munitions industry field to erect the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in the Kunja Revolutionary Site, the speaker said, adding:
					
					 Korea, which was under the yoke of colonial slavery after being deprived of its sovereignty by the imperialists in the past, proudly ranked itself in the advanced space and nuclear powers, startling the world people. This reality is the precious fruition of the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who dedicated themselves to developing the Juche-oriented national defence industry under the uplifted banner of Songun all their lives.
					
					 Being briefed on the statues, the participants went round them.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent by Muhammadu Buhari, president of Nigeria, to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 It was laid before the statues on Tuesday.

articles.title: Senior State Officials, Those of Party and Munitions Industry Field Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Senior State Officials, Those of Party and Munitions Industry Field Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
Songchon, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and party officials, those in the munitions industry field and officials concerned visited the Kunja Revolutionary Site Tuesday.
					 The site is associated with the war victory exploits of President Kim Il Sung who visited it several times during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, encouraged the working people in the munitions field to a heroic struggle for the wartime production of weapons.
					
					 The visitors laid bouquets before the mosaic portraying the President visiting an ordnance factory during the war, and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round the 120mm mortar shop, tool shop, hand grenade shop, bullet shop and other places, being briefed on the fact that the President showed warm loving care and solicitude to the Kunjari workers and laid a firm foundation for the self-reliant national defence industry.

articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Tours Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Tours Phyongchon Revolutionary Site
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Military attaches corps here toured the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site Tuesday in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They laid bouquets before a mosaic depicting the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu before paying tribute to it.
					
					 They went round the buildings associated with exploits of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Earlier, they toured the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace remodeled as a comprehensive extra-educational base.

articles.title: Indonesian Embassy Officials Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
articles.content:
Indonesian Embassy Officials Visit National Gifts Exhibition House
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Bambang Hiendrasto, Indonesian ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials Tuesday visited the National Gifts Exhibition House on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 51st anniversary of naming of Kimilsungia.
					 They made a bow before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with broad smile on their faces in the general review room of the Exhibition House.
					
					 They looked around the gifts associated with deep sincerity of the people in the DPRK, overseas Koreans and south Korean people.

articles.title: Indian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory
articles.content:
Indian Embassy Officials Visit Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Indian ambassador Jasminder Kasturia and staff members of the Indian embassy here Monday visited the DPRK-India Friendship Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory with the approach of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 They went round the room dedicated to the history of the factory, the room for the education in the revolutionary history and several production processes.
					
					 They enjoyed a performance given by the itinerant art squad of the factory and handed over materials prepared by the Indian embassy to the factory.
					
					 Meanwhile, staff members of the Indian embassy Tuesday visited the DPRK-India Friendship Wasan Senior Secondary School in Sosong District, enjoyed an art performance by the students of the school and donated education facilities to the school.

articles.title: Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Here
articles.content:
Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) led by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, arrived here on Tuesday.
					 Kim Su Hae, chairman of the Federation of Koreans in Canada, came here on the same day.

articles.title: Chinese Guests and Koreans in China Arrive
articles.content:
Chinese Guests and Koreans in China Arrive
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign guests and Koreans in China arrived here on Tuesday to take part in the 18th Kimilsungia Festival.
					 Among them were Wang Dongping, general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China, Shao Wenge, general manager of the Dandong Jiahe Commercial Company of China, Li Qianqiu, general manager of the Dandong Jianyuan Commercial Company of China, and Choe Ryong Ho, former vice-president of Yanbian University of Science and Technology of China.
					
					 Ji Zhengtai, general manager of the Beijing Ji Shengchang Culture Co. Ltd. of China, and Xin Qiuxian, vice-chairperson of the Painting and Calligraphy Association of Xian City, Shaanxi Province of China, arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Pays Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Tuesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 Members of the delegation laid a floral basket before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism led by Fujio Hanawa, co-representative of the Kanto Liaison Council, arrived here on Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Awarded to Intellectuals
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Intellectuals were awarded academic degrees and titles with due ceremony on Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The conferment of those degrees and titles were made in recognition of their successes in researches and education which made contributions to building a knowledge-based economic power and a highly civilized nation.
					
					 The title of candidate academician went to teacher Jon Ryong Sam at Kim Il Sung Higher Party School; head of department Han Kwang Ryong, teacher An Jong Do, guidance teacher Kim Sung Gyu and researcher Song Song Gwan at Kim Il Sung University; head of department Kim Haeng Son at Kim Chaek University of Technology and researcher Sim Ho Sik at Pyongyang University of Railways.
					
					 Professorship was awarded to college rector Jong Kwang Yong, heads of departments Kim Nam Hyok and Kim Jin Myong at Kim Il Sung University; college rector Kim Il Nam, vice-dean of faculty Kim Kang Su, heads of departments Ju Kyong Yop and Ri Man Gun at Kim Chaek University of Technology; vice-president Min Hyon Chun of Pyongyang University of Railways; researcher Ri Hyon Sun of the Academy of Social Sciences and researcher Ri Won Myong of the Academy of Medical Science.
					
					 Doctorate was conferred upon Kim Myong Chol, head of department at Kim Il Sung University, Jang Myong Guk, room chief of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, and others while 114 intellectuals were awarded the title of associate professor and 716 others master's degree.

articles.title: First-day Performances of Art Festival Given
articles.content:
First-day Performances of Art Festival Given
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The first-day performances of the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival were given with splendor at theatres in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Among the audience were members of the festival organizing committee, officials concerned, working people, youth and students in the city, foreign diplomatic envoys, members of foreign embassies here, foreign guests staying in the DPRK and overseas Koreans.
					
					 The State Cossacks Dance Company "Stavropolye" of Russia, the instrumental trio ensemble of Cuba, a Peruvian soloist and the art troupe of Koreans in China gave a performance at the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					 The State Academic Classic Ballet Group of Russia, the Flamenco Band of Spain, the Malaysia Fresco Harmonica Ensemble and the art troupe of Koreans in Japan performed at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The State Academic Voronezh Russian Folk Choir, the State Art Troupe of Vietnam, a soloist of the National Opera Theatre of Ukraine and a soloist of the Japan-Korea Society for Music and Art Interchange gave a performance at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 The Piano Trio of Khabarovsk Regional Philharmonic of Russia, a conductor of the Young Philharmonia Italian Orchestra and the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France gave a performance at the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 The State Folk Band Orchestra of Belarus, the Music Company of Cyprus and the art troupe of Koreans in the U.S. performed at the concert hall of Pyongyang Kim Won Gyun Conservatory.
					
					 The circus of the Russian State Circus Company, the circus of the Center for Development of Mongolian Circus, the circus of Vietnam, the Belarusian National Circus, and magicians of Thailand performed at the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					 Art troupes and circuses consisting of well-known international and national concours winners and famous actors and actresses of foreign countries and art troupes of overseas Koreans impressively represented the boundless reverence of all people for the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Put on the stages were colorful numbers with a high degree of ideological and artistic value and national flavor reflecting the aspiration and desire of the Korean people and progressive mankind to build a new world free from war and subjugation in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: Members of Art Group of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Give Performance
articles.content:
Members of Art Group of Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Give Performance
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by members of the art group of the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace Tuesday to celebrate the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and the state.
					 The performance began with a prelude "Glory to Respected Marshal". 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of all schoolchildren's boundless happiness and honor of living under the care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They impressively told the audience that the future of the country is rosy as they are led by Kim Jong Un, who loves schoolchildren more than any others and gives them all blessings.

articles.title: Implementation of Inter-Korea Declarations Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of Inter-Korea Declarations Called for
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative of the People's Solidarity for Implementing June 15, October 4 Declarations of south Korea made public an appeal calling upon the candidates for the 20th "National Assembly" to commit themselves to the implementation of the inter-Korea declarations on April 11.
					 The appeal said that the political camp failed to set forth ways of averting the danger of a nuclear war mounting on the Korean peninsula and lifting the people from destitution.
					
					 It said full implementation of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the great programmes for independent reunification, peace and prosperity, can thwart the outsiders' attempt for a war and protect the life of the nation.
					
					 Noting that reopening of the Kaesong Industrial Zone and tour of Mt. Kumgang are a shortcut to improving people's deteriorated living, the appeal demanded the candidates for the "National Assembly" commit to the issues.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Youth and Children Honor Prizes Awarded to Exemplary Youngsters
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Youth and Children Honor Prizes Awarded to Exemplary Youngsters
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Youth, Children Honor Prizes were awarded to exemplary primary youth league committees, youth league officials and members and children's union members on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 19 primary youth league committees, 30 youth league officials and members were awarded Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize for fully demonstrating the heroic spirit and militant mettle as the young vanguard in the on-going general advance for defending the country and ushering in the greatest heyday for the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize went to 85 children's union members who distinguished themselves in study, life in the children's union, socio-political activities and do-good-thing movement.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the youth league hall Tuesday.

articles.title: Order of Kunjari Working Class Newly Instituted in DPRK
articles.content:
Order of Kunjari Working Class Newly Instituted in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Order of Kunjari Working Class was newly instituted in the DPRK, according to a decree promulgated by the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on April 7.
					 The campaign for winning the title of Kunjari Working Class is a high-level mass campaign of the workers in the sector of the munitions industry to preserve the revolutionary spirit of the working class and provide a solid foundation for turning the country into a new industrial state by learning from the work spirit and style displayed by the workers of Kunjari in the 1950s.
					
					 The Kunjari workers turned out in the wartime production, true to the call of President Kim Il Sung during the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War, produced a lot of weapons and munitions and sent them to the front, decisively overcoming difficulties and ordeals in the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and safeguarding the country and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and hard fortitude, and thus greatly contributed to the July 27 day of victory.
					
					 The state will confer the order upon the officials and workers in the sector of the munitions industry who distinguish themselves in the campaign, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Done in relief inside a ring of 37 mm in diameter on the golden five-point star and rays on the background 60 mm in diameter are a toothed wheel of 34 mm in diameter, Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution, a machine gun and a mortar. Korean letters meaning "the spirit of Kunjari" are inscribed on a red ribbon on its upper part.
					
					 Korean letters meaning "Order of Kunjari Working Class" are depicted on the reverse of the order.

articles.title: Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
articles.content:
Officials, Members of Women's Union Meet
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Officials and members of the women's union held a meeting at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A reporter and speakers said at the meeting that the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and performed undying feats on behalf of the country and its people, times and revolution with his outstanding idea, leadership and noble virtues.
					
					 They noted that the President, having a deep insight into the significance and importance of the issue of settling the women's issue in the revolution and construction, trained the Korean women as genuine revolutionaries and heroes of the times.
					
					 Unforgettable forever are the deep trust and loving care the President showed by projecting the Korean women as a powerful force pushing the one of the two wheels of the chariot of revolution, they noted.
					
					 They called upon all the officials and members of the women's union to hold the President in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche, glorify his idea and feats forever and thus give steady continuity to the history of the sun on this land.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Mangyongdae, where President Kim Il Sung was born and spent his childhood, is a sacred place dear to the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					 In the run-up to the Day of the Sun on April 15, the birth anniversary of the President, more than ten thousand servicepersons, officials of the ministries and national institutions, working people and schoolchildren visited Mangyongdae with yearning for him every day.
					
					 Through their visits they grasped the revolutionary career of the President who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, fought a bloody anti-Japanese armed struggle to liberate the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists and built the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Hopeful Woman Marathoner of DPRK
articles.content:
Hopeful Woman Marathoner of DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Ji Hyang of the DPRK came first at the Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon (42.195km) held here on April 10 with the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as an occasion.
					 In the women's race, Kim from the Pyongyang Sports Team finished tape in 2:28:04, thus renewing the record she set at the 2015 Beijing Marathon to be qualified for the 31st Olympiad.
					
					 She made a new record of 2:34:52 at the Chinese Taipei International Marathon two years ago and bagged a trophy in half marathon of the 2015 Singapore Women's Race.
					
					 Born in Jagang Province of the country, she has also proven successful in national games, including the women's marathon (30km) of the Youth Championship in 2013.

articles.title: Mirae Shop Opened to Guests
articles.content:
Mirae Shop Opened to Guests
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Mirae Shop newly built on the bank of the Pothong River in Pyongyang was opened to guests early in April.
					 The shop, an embodiment of the principle of convenience and architectural beauty first, stores electronic appliances, daily necessities including cosmetics, foodstuffs, etc.
					
					 Ko Tong Sik, a researcher of the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 All goods in the shop are very excellent, so I and my family could hardly choose what we should have to buy. Such splendid shop was built for us scientists thanks to the Workers' Party of Korea's idea of attaching importance to science and talents. I will do my best to repay the loving care shown by the WPK for scientists with more scientific achievements.
					
					 Kim Hwa Suk, wife of Jon Il Ho, chief of a research institute of Kim Chaek University of Technology, said:
					
					 My family moved to a luxurious flat in Mirae Scientists Street completed under the loving care of the WPK for scientists last year. And today, Mirae shop opened to us scientists thanks to the loving care.
					
					 I will devote myself to materializing the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: Early Vegetables Supplied to Pyongyangites
articles.content:
Early Vegetables Supplied to Pyongyangites
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of tons of early vegetables were supplied to citizens of Pyongyang, the capital of the DPRK, on Tuesday through commercial networks in the city.
					 Farms in the suburbs of Pyongyang reaped a rich crop of vegetables this spring, despite unfavorable weather conditions.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the agricultural workers redoubled their efforts to increase the production of vegetables, in hearty response to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea to greet its 7th Congress with signal achievements in the improvement of the people's living standard.
					
					 The supply service is a basic mode of the socialist commerce aimed to meet the convenience of working citizens.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Un as Great Leader of WPK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Jong Un as Great Leader of WPK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article praises Marshal Kim Jong Un as an outstanding leader who is developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into a glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The article says:
					
					 The WPK has Kim Jong Un at its top post, reflecting the urgent requirements of the times and developing revolution and the general will of all the party members, service personnel and people.
					
					 The post of steering the party and revolution is, indeed, important and responsible. Whoever is elected to the leadership position cannot successfully steer the revolution.
					
					 History and reality clearly show that the party or state which exercised tremendous influence may collapse all of a sudden and the revolution at the crossroads of the rise and fall can emerge victorious, depending on the role of its leader.
					
					 It is the greatest honor and fortune for the party and people making revolution to have a wise leader.
					
					 The period of history in which Kim Jong Un has steered the party and revolution has been exciting years for the servicepersons and people of the DPRK as they have ceaselessly enjoyed the greatest honor and happiness under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 This period witnessed the full demonstration of the extraordinary leadership ability of the great WPK as it has fully displayed the might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea by uniting close the popular masses and giving full play to their inexhaustible strength and wisdom.
					
					 The WPK has developed into the only party of the leader in the world and an invincible revolutionary party thanks to the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un, an incarnation of the most intense loyalty to the leaders and a creditable successor to their leadership traits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un, Songun Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un, Songun Brilliant Commander
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- It is four years after Kim Jong Un took the top party and state posts in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the period, he has displayed his rare qualifications and political caliber as a gifted great person, leading the DPRK army and people's struggle for defence of socialism and showdown with the U.S. to victory.
					
					 He strengthened the armed forces of the DPRK into an invincible army replete with the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu, and equipped them with diverse means of powerful strike of Korean style.
					
					 His matchless pluck and grit and unique commanding art have served as an inspiring banner that instills optimism and confidence in sure victory into the Korean people and as a deadly blow to the hostile forces committing grave political and military provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 His distinguished stratagem foiled all the U.S. nuclear threats and aggression moves, including such joint war games as Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian. In August last year when a touch-and-go situation was prevailing in the Korean peninsula, he aroused all the servicepersons and civilians to the struggle for defending the dignity and destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 Under his seasoned guidance, the DPRK is now taking strong counteractions one after another to cope with the nuclear war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea who were taken aback by its successful H-bomb test.
					
					 It is the steadfast resolve of the Korean army and people led by him to achieve the final victory in the struggle for national reunification and the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 That's why the community and personages of the world have praised supreme leader Kim Jong Un's distinguished political caliber, saying that he is leading the DPRK to the final victory in the struggle for socialism with his decisive and tough politics.

articles.title: S. Korea's Increase of Military Expenditure Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korea's Increase of Military Expenditure Denounced
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Members of the south Korean preparatory committee for the "World Disarmament Action Day" made public a statement at the Kwanghwamun Plaza in Seoul on April 5 denouncing the authorities' increase of military expenditure, according to the south Korean News 1.
					 The statement said arms expenditure of south Korea came the tenth in the world list while the one for the people's livelihood came last.
					
					 In 2014 arms import topped the world list, an amount enough for paying prime pension for 70 percent of the old people every month.
					
					 It stressed the need for the 20th "National Assembly" not to use taxes as military expenditure but to use it for improving the living of common people.

articles.title: Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Occurs in S. Korea
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Bird flu occurred in Kwangju City of Kyonggi Province in south Korea on April 7, according to the south Korean MBC.
					 There is an increasing concern over expansion of damage caused by bird flu that occurred at a duck farm in Richon City of Kyonggi Province on March 26.

articles.title: Korean Youths in Japan Protest against Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
Korean Youths in Japan Protest against Park Geun Hye Group
Tokyo, April 11 (KNS-KCNA) -- A group of Korean youths in Japan staged an action outside the U.S. embassy and south Korean puppet embassy in Tokyo on April 11 in protest against the extra-large provocations of the U.S. and Park Geun Hye group challenging the supreme dignity of the DPRK.
					 The group of 50 young Koreans in Kanto area headed by Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, launched the action outside the U.S. embassy, holding suspension posters and placards denouncing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 Upset by this, the Japanese authorities hurled a lot of police to check the protest action. However, the protest group bitterly denounced the U.S. without any hesitation.
					
					 Then the group went toward the south Korean puppet embassy. Breaking through the Japanese police line, the group reached the embassy and chanted slogans, holding posters and placards denouncing traitor Park Geun Hye.
					
					 The head of the group read out the protest letter reflecting the surging anger and resolution of Korean youngsters in Japan to severely punish the Park Geun Hye group before conveying it to the embassy.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Pay Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) visited the statues of the President and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Tuesday.
					 Members of the group laid bouquets before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Russian Political Party Praises Popular Policies in DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Political Party Praises Popular Policies in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Communist Parties-the Communist Party of the Soviet Union posted an article titled "Social phenomena peculiar to the DPRK" praising the advantages of the socialist system in the DPRK on its website on April 6.
					 The article said:
					
					 Foreign visitors to the DPRK are surprised to know the fact that the ordinary people in the DPRK are living in modern dwelling houses without knowing about housing price.
					
					 This is something unbelievable to the West where many people are living in the rented houses.
					
					 A section doctor system is in force in the DPRK so that doctors in charge of the residents in their district may take care of them in a responsible manner.
					
					 The West is floating misinformation about the DPRK, but genuine human rights are guaranteed in the DPRK where free healthcare is provided.
					
					 All young people are given opportunity to receive free education thanks to the universal free compulsory education system.
					
					 Free education is enforced for those students at higher educational institutions up to postgraduate course after the universal 12-year compulsory education.
					
					 There is no jobless person in the DPRK.
					
					 Women enjoy equal rights with men as the mistresses of the state and society.
					
					 They become deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly and manageresses of industrial establishments. 
					
					 The DPRK is the only country free from despair and crimes.
					
					 Koreans enjoy the benefits of the benevolent people-oriented policies free from the burdens of registration fee, doctor's fee, rent and taxes which are common around the world.
					
					 Popular policies are enforced in all social fabrics in the DPRK. That is a fundamental difference from the capitalist countries where money decides everything and jungle law governs.

articles.title: Japanese Organizations Denounce U.S.-South Korea War Exercises against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Organizations Denounce U.S.-South Korea War Exercises against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Japanese organizations on March 18 and 30 issued statements lashing out at the anti-DPRK war games of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime. 
					 The Nagano Prefectural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea denounced the U.S. for persistently sidestepping the DPRK's just proposal for concluding a peace treaty and escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula through madcap saber-rattling in league with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The statement branded the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK as outdated and anachronistic one.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. stop all acts of escalating tension in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The Gunma Prefectural People's Council for Japan-Korea Friendship and Solidarity urged the U.S. to immediately discontinue the joint military exercises with south Korea and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.

articles.title: German Organization Demands U.S. Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
articles.content:
German Organization Demands U.S. Conclude Peace Treaty with DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on April 6 made public a statement urging the U.S. to conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is foolish of the U.S. and its followers to shift the blame for the escalated tension on the Korean peninsula onto the DPRK.
					
					 They refuse like naive children to recognize the status of the DPRK as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 They provoke wars and stir up social unrest wherever they go in the world and victimize many innocent people on the altar of "protecting human rights" and "Western-style view on value" in violation of international law.
					
					 We demand the U.S. recognize the undeniable status of the DPRK as a nuclear weapons state and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK, though belatedly.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let the Women of the North and the South Unite and Hasten the Reunification of the Country" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on April 3 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Also posted on the website was a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting in Iceland, a remembrance meeting and book and photo exhibition in Germany and a stamp show in Serbia on April 5 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Displayed at the venues of those events were photos documenting the exploits of Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were their works, and books, photos and stamps introducing the struggle of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said the exploits performed by the President on behalf of the times and humankind would shine forever, praising him for making great contributions to the cause of Korea's reunification and the cause of global independence after embarking upon the road of revolution in his teens. 
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said the President built a genuine paradise for the people in the DPRK and wisely led it to dynamically advance along the road chosen by it despite any storm and stress.
					
					 He was convinced that the servicepersons and people of the DPRK will adorn the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea as the one of victors and realize the desire of the President without fail under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Indonesian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Indonesian Newspapers
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Indonesian newspapers each devoted their one whole page to special write-ups under the title "Congratulations on the Day of the Sun in DPRK", etc. illustrated with the portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung and his photo and photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary).
					 International Media on April 2 said in an article titled "Kim Il Sung, the great man in 20th century" that many great men were recorded in the history of humankind but it does not know such man as the President who was boundlessly praised and revered by all people for several decades.
					
					 International Daily on April 5 said in an article titled "Broad smile" that the President's smile reflected satisfaction and pride as a man and statesman and the faith and optimism about the bright future of socialist Korea.
					
					 The President's broad smile will last forever with the reality of the DPRK undergoing dramatic changes and making a leap forward towards a thriving socialist nation thanks to Kim Jong Un, the newspaper said.
					
					 The newspaper carried an article introduced the spirit of self-reliance and self-development of the Korean people.
					
					 Newspapers carried photos showing the launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 and Mirae Scientists Street.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Pakistan
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was published in pamphlet by the Victorial Publishing House of Pakistan.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on April 6.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Poland
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Torun Publishing House of Poland on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for resolutely defending and preserving the ideas and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and endlessly adding shine to them.

articles.title: Acto central por 4o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en supremo cargo de Partido y Estado
articles.content:
Acto central por 4o aniversario de eleccion de Kim Jong Un en supremo cargo de Partido y Estado
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 11 en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central por el 4o aniversario de la eleccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un en el supremo cargo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el Estado.
					Asistieron alli Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los miembros del organo de direccion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Pyongyang, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea y del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los funcionarios, innovadores laborales y trabajadores de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas de esta capital.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del vicemariscal del EPC, Hwang Pyong So, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC.
					
					El informante senalo que la eleccion del Mariscal como Primer Secretario del PTC y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, ha sido el especial evento y el gran jubilo revolucionario que abrio una nueva historia de gran prosperidad ante el Partido, la patria y la nacion.
					
					Gracias a poner al Mariscal en el supremo cargo del Partido y el Estado, se heredo firmemente el linaje de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun, se ha mantenido infaliblemente el caracter revolucionario del Partido y el Estado de los companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y preparado la garantia invencible de la marcha de nueva centuria de Juche, destaco el  orador y prosiguio:
					
					El Mariscal es el genial comandante de acero quien consolida mil veces la capacidad autodefensiva del pais y defiende firmemente la dignidad y la soberania de la patria y la nacion con la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					
					El Mariscal presento la transformacion de todo el ejercito segun el Kimilsungismo-Kimjongilismo como deber general de la construccion del ejercito y al presentar las originales ideas y teorias sobre la construccion del ejercito incluyendo el lineamiento sobre los cuatro puntos para el fortalecimiento del ejercito, fortalecio considerablemente el Ejercito Popular de Corea como remedio omnipotente para defender la patria, la revolucion y el pueblo.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Mariscal, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias se han convertido en el ejercito revolucionario del partido donde esta establecido firmemente el sistema de direccion unica del Partido y en el ejercito fuerte en la idea y la moral con la conviccion revolucionaria del Paektu y el espiritu de la bandera roja.
					
					Igualmente se han fortalecido como ejercito invencible dotado de los poderosos medios de golpe de punta.
					
					El Mariscal prendio las llamaradas del movimiento por el tirador y artillero certeros, organizo y dirigio personalmente los ejercicios de combate de varias operaciones y avivo el fervor del entrenamiento del monte Paektu en todo el ejercito, asi que formo a todos los militares como expertos en la guerra moderna y verdaderos guerreros versados en la estrategia y las tacticas militares de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y armados con el heroico espiritu y plena capacidad de combate.
					
					Presento la nueva linea del desarrollo paralelo y dirigio energicamente a elevar incesantemente el nivel de la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion, la fundamentacion cientifica de la industria de defensa nacional y a desarrollar y producir muchos pertrechos poderosos y diversificados a estilo coreano, de manera que consolido firmemente la base material y tecnica de la capacidad autodefensiva del pais.
					
					Ha convertido nuestro pais en la poderosa potencia nuclear que poseyo hasta la bomba de hidrogeno, lo que es la mayor hazana del Mariscal lograda por la patria y la nacion, la victoria de la revolucion del Juche y la causa independencia de las masas populares.
					
					El Mariscal es el gran politico y maestro de direccion quien prepara nuevo trampolin de la gran empresa de la construccion de un Estado prospero abriendo la epoca de grandiosa creacion y cambio con la extraordinaria capacidad politica y la veterana y probada direccion.
					
					Todos los militantes del Partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el pueblo deben defender firmemente en lo politico e ideologico y a ultranza y apoyar con fidelidad al Mariscal con el orgullo nacional de enaltecer al gran dirigente sin par en el supremo cargo del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea frustraran rotundamente con las fuerzas de justicia sin perdonar en lo minimo las imprudentes maniobras provocativas de los imperialistas yanquis y las fuerzas satelites que actuan con frenesi por impedir nuestro avance y eliminar nuestra idea, causa y regimen socialista y lucharan con dinamismo por la reunificacion independiente de la patria, la paz y seguridad del mundo y la causa de la independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Todos, unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal, deben hacer valer con el alto entusiasmo politico y los exitos laborales sin precedentes el VII Congreso del PTC y hacer todos los esfuerzos por adelantar la victoria final de la causa de la revolucion del Juche y el futuro de la potencia prospera reunificada.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 Bashar al-Assad, presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 15 de abril de 2016, aniversario 104 del nacimiento del gran Lider Kim Il Sung, eterno Presidente de la RPDC, envio a Vd. mi mas calida felicitacion y deseo a Vd. buena salud y felicidad, y al pueblo coreano amistoso, mayor progreso y prosperidad.
					
					En visperas del dia de nacimiento de Su Excelencia Presidente Kim Il Sung, recordamos las nobles proezas de el quien fundo la RPDC y presento la linea principal de la Revolucion Coreana, de modo que vuestro pais amistoso defendiera la soberania e independencia, practicara la politica independiente y ocupara una posicion importante en la escena mundial.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad particular para expresar la seguridad de que las excelentes relaciones existentes entre la RAS y la RPDC se consolidaran mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos amistosos de ambos paises.

articles.title: MINREX critica disparate de  dialogo de algunas partes
articles.content:
MINREX critica disparate de  dialogo de algunas partes
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea formulada en relacion con que circula en contornos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea los disparates de dialogo, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 12 la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, en la Peninsula Coreana se crea la situacion muy peligrosa debido a las maniobras de provocacion de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. En tales condiciones algunas partes sueltan disparates de las conversaciones a 6 bandas y la realizacion paralela de la desnuclearizacion y la concertacion del convenio de paz.
					
					Es muy conocido por todos el que la actual situacion de la Peninsula Coreana no da ningun ambiente a pensar en el dialogo.
					
					A consecuencia de los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea sin precedentes en la historia y las justas medidas autodefensivas de nuestro ejercito tomadas frente a ellos, en la misma Peninsula queda solo la confrontacion nuclear. 
					
					El dialogo es el medio de las partes interesadas basado en el respeto mutuo y la igualdad. 
					
					No negamos el dialogo mismo, pero rechazamos cabalmente el dialogo desigual.
					
					Nuestra invariable posicion de principio es que bajo la presion unilateral, nunca podemos tomar parte en el dialogo.
					
					Son incompatibles el dialogo y la amenaza militar, el dialogo y la sancion.
					
					No es aceptable para nosotros la logica absurda de que el objetivo de la sancion es para realizar el dialogo.
					
					Debido a los recrudescentes actos hostiles de EE.UU., el problema nuclear de la RPDC no tiene que ver con el dialogo ya desde hace mucho tiempo.
					
					Ya se quedo invalida nuestra propuesta sobre el cese del simulacro militar conjunto vs el cese de prueba nuclear, dado que el mismo EE.UU. la rechazo.
					
					Como ya hemos declarado, nuestra linea de desarrollo paralelo seguira con vigor hasta que se logre la desnuclearizacion mundial.
					
					El problema primordial a ser resuelto en la Peninsula Coreana es precisamente el fin completo de la politica de hostilidad anti-RPDC de EE.UU., que genera todos los problemas.
					
					Solucionar por medio del dialogo y la negociacion o de otra manera depende enteramente de la conducta de EE.UU.

articles.title: ACRC demanda al Sur de Corea devolver a los secuestrados norcoreanos
articles.content:
ACRC demanda al Sur de Corea devolver a los secuestrados norcoreanos
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los titeres surcoreanos secuestraron colectivamente a plena luz del dia a los moradores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea que trabajaban en el extranjero, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de Corea (ACRC) hizo publica el dia 12 una declaracion. 
					Segun la nota, las autoridades surcoreanas anunciaron que el pasado dia 7, los empleados norcoreanos, que gestionaban un restaurante en Ningbo de la provincia china de Zhejiang, "se refugiaron en colectivo" y que el Sur de Corea "los acepta respetando sus deseos y en el principio humanitario".
					
					Al mismo tiempo, difunden el rumor erroneo de que el presente caso de "fuga colectiva" es el "efecto sustancial" de la ejecucion de la "resolucion de sancion anti-Norte de la ONU" y "refleja la incertidumbre de la poblacion norcoreana sobre el regimen socialista y su simpatia por la sociedad surcoreana".
					
					El presente incidente es el secuestro colectivo sin precedentes inventado por los gangsteres del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia del Sur de Corea, revela el documento y aclara la siguiente posicion:
					
					Primero, denunciamos categoricamente el presente secuestro colectivo calificandolo de mas grave crimen que amenaza la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC y la vida y seguridad del personal norcoreano.
					
					El incidente de "fuga colectiva" inventado por los titeres surcoreanos resulta grave provocacion a la RPDC e intolerable insulto al pueblo coreano.
					
					Segundo, los titeres surcoreanos deben pedir perdon por su crimen atroz y devolver de inmediato a todo el personal secuestrado
					
					Deben descubrir todos los criminales y sus controladores traseros que secuestraron a nuestros moradores al Sur de Corea mediante el adormecimiento, el engano y el ardid de toda indole y someterlos al tribunal. 
					
					Sabemos como los gangsteres del Servicio Nacional del Inteligencia del Sur de Corea adormecieron y enganaron a nuestros moradores y como los arrestaron al Sur de Corea por via de un pais de Sudeste Asiatico bajo el amparo de un pais especifico.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos deben aceptar incondicionalmente a nuestra demanda y devolver lo mas pronto posible a nuestros moradores inocentes, en lugar de impedir su contacto con el exterior so pretexto de la "proteccion de la seguridad" y ejercer a puertas cerradas el adormecimiento y la coaccion a las mujeres de la RPDC.
					
					Tercero, en el caso de no devolver a nuestros moradores, los titeres surcoreanos se responsabilizaran por su grave consecuencia. 
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben tener presente que si no piden perdon por su crimen intolerable ni devuelven al personal de la RPDC, se produciran las consecuencias inimaginables y se tomaran las medidas especiales de castigo inclemente.

articles.title: Subunidades artilleras desarrollan entrenamiento de disparo de proyectiles
articles.content:
Subunidades artilleras desarrollan entrenamiento de disparo de proyectiles
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Las subunidades artilleras adscritas a las grandes unidades combinadas del Ejercito Popular de Corea desarrollaron el dia 9 un entrenamiento de disparo de proyectiles destinado a destruir a los colectivos enemigos que desembarquen de modo sorpresivo en la noche.
					Tomaron parte alli los canones de diferentes calibres de las grandes unidades combinadas 526 y 287 del EPC.
					
					Lo dirigieron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Myong Su, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
					
					Lo presenciaron los profesores de la Academia Militar General Kim Il Sung y el Instituto Militar de Postgraduado Kim Jong Il.
					
					El entrenamiento se realizo a manera de disparar los proyectiles contra los blancos individuales tales como los buques auxiliares y los grupos de desembarco de los enemigos que se infiltren en el mar en la noche muy oscura, y de disparo de linea.
					
					Los artilleros ocuparon rapidamente las posiciones de fuego con elevada movilidad.
					
					Fueron descubiertos y distinguidos exactamente los supuestos "buques enemigos" infiltrados sorpresivamente en el mar aprovechando la noche muy oscura y se completo en un santiamen la preparacion de disparo.
					
					Al darse la orden de disparo, los proyectiles lanzados acertaron continuamente a los buques "enemigos".
					
					Los buques "enemigos" se destruyeron de un tiro por los tiradores artilleros y la zona de ataque se convirtio en el crisol de muerte.
					
					En el marco del entrenamiento, se realizo tambien el intensivo golpe de fuego maritimo de los canones de diferentes calibres para destruir el "colectivo enemigo" de desembarco.
					
					El entrenamiento ha demostrado a todo el mundo el invencible poderio del poderoso ejercito revolucionario de Kim Jong Un dispuesto a responder a las provocaciones de los agresores del imperialismo yanqui y los compinches titeres surcoreanos con el contraataque inmediato, y a la guerra de agresion con la justa guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
